Projects

AperioApp.com
  • Full stack app with front-end written in JavaScript React and back-end written in Python Django.
  • Allows users to track their acne over time alongside products and food. The goal is to identify triggers and products that are reducing or exacerbating outbreaks.
  • Currently in a data collection stage to develop useful reports to identify triggers.
Rusty Hue
  • Smart lights command line interface written in Rust.
  • Utilizes a REST API to toggle lights on and off, set colors, and edit configurations.
Reading Time
  • Firefox browser extension written in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
  • Counts the number of words on a webpage and displays the estimated reading time for the user.
  • Currently has 50+ active, weekly users.
Movie List
  • Python program to scrape a webpage for a list of movies playing in Edmonton.
  • Uses an API to retrieve movie ratings.
  • Emails a list of top rated movies and descriptions to a short list of emails.
Conway's Game of Life (Arduino)
  • A custom version of Conway's Game of Life written in C++ for an Arduino Mega.
  • Utilizes the traditional rules plus born 'creature' inherits color from parent.
